alert.note: Alert for Niihau in Kauai (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued December 18 at 3:24AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 AM HST THIS MORNING FOR THE ISLAND OF KAUAI IN KAUAI COUNTY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...The island of Kauai in Kauai County. * WHEN...Until 630 AM HST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding on roads, poor drainage areas, and in streams. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 321 AM HST, radar indicated widespread moderate to heavy rain moving over Kauai, with additional heavy showers approaching from the southwest. Rain gages indicate that the heavier showers were producing rainfall rates as high as 2 inches per hour. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... the entire island of Kauai, with rainfall especially heavy along south and west facing slopes and coasts. This advisory may need to be extended beyond 630 AM HST if flooding persists.
info.instruction: Stay away from streams, drainage ditches and low lying areas prone to flooding. Do not cross fast flowing or rising water in your vehicle, or on foot. Turn around, don`t drown.
